column2: an A.M. Eatery////Since you're likely to be waiting for a while
column3: Snooze is actually prime if you're trying to catch up with someone because you can use the time to catch up on their life. And if you have an especially long wait
column4: you can even walk across the street to Half-Price Books and do some browsing. You may think I'm kidding
column5: but these are actually ways that I've passed the time while waiting for a table at Snooze...
